comments: /** Convert pixels from one format to another. No dithering or filtering is being done. Converting
from RGB to luminance takes the R channel.

@param	src			PixelBox containing the source pixels,
 pitches and format

@param	dst			PixelBox containing the destination pixels,
 pitches and format
@remarks The source and destination boxes must have the same

dimensions. In case the source and destination format match,
 a plain copy is done.
